name: Maskoch
description:
Heavily work in progress (WIP) project as to have some casual social & edutaining fun online again in the styles of both old and new technical innovations, encouraging curiosity and interactive creativity version per version. I wish to develop and play JIT hot-editable environments around NPR & neue retro toon assets in copyleft ways and this is my way of doing it.

It would be for a social cute toon tinkering space for learning skills, sharing knowledge and building personalized developer stacks & environment. Being designed for extruding a layered 2D sector map into a 3D multi-user playground inspired by the works of Ken Silverman, Qodot and Valve's Source engine.

The first, current protoype, made in Mosi is a extremely simple base for me to start the development process and gotta rework it cyclic-ally towards the transparent & direct access 3D interactive visualization toy it deserves to be.
